#Mailcheap

[Mailcheap.co](https://www.mailcheap.co/) (Cyberlabs s.r.o. CZ & Cyberlabs Inc. USA) provides enterprise email solutions at affordable prices.

#What's new?

- Reseller-Enterprise plans have custom branding, AI spam filtering, Premium Relay (SMTP) & WHMCS plugin as standard.
- Online installer to deploy your private mailserver in minutes (dedicated resources/KVM).
- POP fetch and IMAP migration tools.

#Products

- [Premium Mail ](https://www.mailcheap.co/premium_mail.html)
- [Reseller plans w/ WHMCS plugin ](https://www.mailcheap.co/reseller.html)
- [Enterprise Email ](https://www.mailcheap.co/email.html)
- [Inbound spam filtering / Mail forwarding ](https://www.mailcheap.co/spamfilter.html)
- [Backup MX / Queuing relay service ](https://www.mailcheap.co/backupmx.html)
- [SMTP Relays with Outbound AVAS Filtering ](https://www.mailcheap.co/smtprelays.html)


#Features (basic plans)

- **Unlimited Users**
- **Unlimited Domains**
- **Premium Relay (SMTP)**
- Web based admin panel
- Advanced anti-spam (AI) & anti-virus protection (4-step filtration) w/ quarantine management
- Choice of two webmails: SOGo & Afterlogic (50 MB att.)
- WebMail, Contacts (CardDAV) & Calendar (CalDAV) w/ Exchange ActiveSync (SOGo)
- Sieve filtering, vacation auto responder, graphical stats
- SPF, DKIM, DMARC support
- IMAP, SMTP, POP, EAS support
- TLS for secure access & transmission
- Free setup & migration [tools](https://console.mymailcheap.com)
- DDoS protection
- RAID protection & offsite data replication
- Geo-redundant dual backup MX
- Comprehensive [documentation](https://www.mailcheap.co/help.html)
- Full support (L1/L3)
